metadata.name: Code in Rust
metadata.shortDescription: Assist developers coding in Rust by enforcing team practices, SOLID principles, and Git workflow standards
metadata.description: This skill provides Rust coding assistance while strictly enforcing team practices loaded from the local practices folder. It ensures code follows SOLID principles (SRP, DI), Rust idioms, proper error handling, and Git workflow best practices including worktree usage and small, frequent commits.
objectives: Load and enforce Rust coding practices from local practices folder
Ensure all generated code follows SOLID principles and Rust idioms
Verify Git worktree setup before code modifications
Guide developers toward small, frequent commits
